trans-unit.source: Azure Storage Analytics enables you to collect metrics (Storage Metrics) from your Azure storage accounts and log data (Storage Logging) about requests sent to your storage account.
trans-unit.target: Azure Storage Analytics enables you to collect metrics (Storage Metrics) from your Azure storage accounts and log data (Storage Logging) about requests sent to your storage account.

trans-unit.source: You can use Storage Metrics to monitor the health of a storage account, and Storage Logging to diagnose and troubleshoot issues with your storage account.
trans-unit.target: You can use Storage Metrics to monitor the health of a storage account, and Storage Logging to diagnose and troubleshoot issues with your storage account.

trans-unit.source: Storage Analytics has a 20TB limit on the amount of stored data that is independent of the total limit for your storage account.
trans-unit.target: Storage Analytics has a 20TB limit on the amount of stored data that is independent of the total limit for your storage account.

trans-unit.source: For more information on billing and data retention policies, see <externalLink><linkText>Storage Analytics and Billing</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh360997.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on billing and data retention policies, see <externalLink><linkText>Storage Analytics and Billing</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh360997.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: For more information on storage account limits, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure Storage Scalability and Performance Targets</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn249410.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on storage account limits, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure Storage Scalability and Performance Targets</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn249410.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to enable and view Storage Metrics data, see the topic <link xlink:href="f3d15d3a-e898-4c6f-911d-3a936810c7b3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Enabling Storage Metrics and viewing metrics data</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about how to enable and view Storage Metrics data, see the topic <link xlink:href="f3d15d3a-e898-4c6f-911d-3a936810c7b3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Enabling Storage Metrics and viewing metrics data</link>.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to enable and access Storage Logging data, see the topic <link xlink:href="7edfcd7b-26ce-405c-bfb6-87e52930c344" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Enabling Storage Logging and accessing log data</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about how to enable and access Storage Logging data, see the topic <link xlink:href="7edfcd7b-26ce-405c-bfb6-87e52930c344" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Enabling Storage Logging and accessing log data</link>.

trans-unit.source: For guidance on using Storage Metrics and Storage Logging to troubleshoot storage issues, see the guide <externalLink><linkText>Monitoring, Diagnosing, and Troubleshooting Microsoft Azure Storage</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=510535</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For guidance on using Storage Metrics and Storage Logging to troubleshoot storage issues, see the guide <externalLink><linkText>Monitoring, Diagnosing, and Troubleshooting Microsoft Azure Storage</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=510535</linkUri></externalLink>.
